Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst
Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: However, the low internal reforming performance and the coking at anode become the big challenges of SOFC using LC-CMM.
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: Therefore, the Mo-doped NiTiO3 catalyst layer is fabricated over SOFC anode in this work.
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: The catalyst can be in-situ reduced to nanoscale Ni and Mo-doped TiO2-delta composite catalyst with plentiful oxygen vacancies, thus adsorbing oxygen species to enhance CH4 internal reforming and remove carbon.
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: It is demonstrated that the catalyst-modified SOFC using LC-CMM exhibits the much better electrochemical performance, anti-carbon effect and discharging stability than the un-modified SOFC.
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: The modified SOFC also shows the good electrochemical and internal reforming performances under different LC-CMM with various methane concentration c(CH4) and oxygen concentration c(O-2).
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: The distribution of relaxation time (DRT) indicates that the catalyst can remove carbon and facilitates the adsorption, dissociation and transport of surface species through the enhanced oxygen-species mediated surface reactions.
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst

Sentencas: Besides, a 2D multi-physics coupling model is built to study the reforming-enhancing and anti-carbon mechanisms of the catalyst layer.
Titulo: Efficient conversion of low-concentration coal mine methane by solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ formed nanocomposite catalyst
